Test SSH key
echo 'ssh-rsa  agungyuliaji@Agungs-MacBook-Pro.local' | dokku deploy:allow rails-sample


Add Git User
useradd -o -u 1000 git
sudo usermod -d /home/dokku git
usermod -aG docker dokku
